plot: Two Austrians. One School Bus. A Continent of Music Adi and Stefan go on an adventure through Latin America with only their guitars and an old school bus. Exposed to hardship and injustice they discover that music transcends all.
title: El Rey
plot_es: Two Austrians. One School Bus. A Continent of Music Adi and Stefan go on an adventure through Latin America with only their guitars and an old school bus. Exposed to hardship and injustice they discover that music transcends all.
plot_en: Two Austrians. One School Bus. A Continent of Music Adi and Stefan go on an adventure through Latin America with only their guitars and an old school bus. Exposed to hardship and injustice they discover that music transcends all.

cast.name: Los Zapatistas de Magdalena de la Paz
